---
title: "Banner Example"
format: html
---

::: {#styles .cell}
```{=html}
<style>
.banner-container {
  /* Make this container take a specific height so the background is visible. */
  width: 100%;
  height: 400px;        /* Adjust as desired */
  position: relative;   /* So the child elements can position absolutely */

  /* Fixed background image to create a “banner” effect */
  background: url('../img/CI_cover.jpeg') no-repeat;
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center; 
  background-attachment: fixed;  
}

.banner-text {
  /* Position this text absolutely within the .banner-container */
  position: absolute;

  /* Tune these values until the text is exactly over the black region of the image */
  left: 40px; 
  bottom: 40px;

  color: white;         /* visible on a black background */
  font-size: 1.5rem;    /* style as you like */
  margin: 0;
}
</style>
:::

::: {#banner .cell}
```{=html}
<div class="banner-container">
  <div class="banner-text">
    <h1>Carbon-I</h1>
    <p>Subtitle or descriptive text goes here.</p>
  </div>
</div>
:::
